name: Neolux
description:
NEOLUX is a French company which specialises in design, creation and integration of innovative LED lighting solutions for professionals. It positions itself on niche and top range markets. NEOLUX proposes quality products and high added value services:
- a multidisciplinary R&D department which devices innovative products and also can attend customized projects
- a photometry laboratory unique in Europe thanks to which we can qualify products dedicated to high-tech markets
- a collaborative partnership with the CEA-Leti, a French research laboratory
- a total mastery of industrial processes (technological watch, qualification of partners, conception and making) which fully complies with professionals’ needs and the rapid growth of the market.
- a full service offer which secures customer relationships: bespoke conception, technical and economical studies, technical advice and lighting design.
